tool_description: Access the official Israeli Government company register via this API. Ideal for KYB purposes
name: Israel Company Data
title: Israel Company Data

api_list.name: SearchbyCompanyName
api_list.description:
This API endpoint can be used to search for an Israeli company name or company identifier. 

The resource ID should always be set to f004176c-b85f-4542-8901-7b3176f9a054  as the default value.
